mng: to lift up (sth hanging down), to raise (hem of skirt), to pull up (sleeve), to sprinkle (water with cupped hands)

to lift up (sth hanging down), to raise (hem of skirt), to pull up (sleeve), to sprinkle (water with cupped hands)
